extendedInfo.description: With Messages+ you can send free messages over 3G or WiFi (when available) to your contacts who use Messages+ , or send regular SMS/MMS messages - all from one place. Messages+ includes WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and more social networks integration.  Messages+ is a messaging launcher app for Contacts+ , a free âall in oneâ contacts, dialer & sms app.Features:â Beautiful messaging designâ FREE messages between Messages+ users â Group SMSâ SMS draftsâ Homescreen messages pop upâ Free messages backup and restoreâ Individual sms ringtonesâ Integrated contacts, call log and dialer (swipe right from messages screen)â WhatsApp integration ! â Social Networks: Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin and Foursquareâ Light / Dark themesâ Auto pictures and birthdays sync with Facebookâ Birthdays reminders_____________CONTACT US:Weâre always happy to get your feedback and answer any questions at: info@contactspls.comFacebook: facebook.com/contactsplsTwitter: twitter.com/contactspluswww.contactspls.com

reviews.title: Good application but?
reviews.comment: But please. Enhance the messaging+ notification. Like the notification of Messaging on Jellybean. The function that can pinch in and pinch out the notification. Thanks. Great app!
reviews.author: Jheii Markova

reviews.title: simple and clean but less features
reviews.comment: i have been using go sms for a long time and i really wanted to switch to some other apps because of its kiddish design. now i would rate a five start for the design and a four star for the functionality. sending contacts should be simplified. loving the design :)
reviews.author: Nihell Mohammed

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Great! Although, when going into a group message, I can\'t seem to find a way to add pictures or anything like that. If you guys could work something out there, that would be great. And it is a little slow, although this app is worth the wait of a second or two.
reviews.author: Domagoj Bosnjak

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I love it. It\'s visually beautiful, responds well. Very few issues. The only thing I wish you would add is Emoji support. That would give this app 5 stars.
reviews.author: Joshua Williams

reviews.title: I\'m happy to have it!
reviews.comment: I love how this app squeezes everything into one. I love the fact that I can personalize it... plus, the fact that it\'s free. Great to the nth power! I just have a little concern about the speed--inbox is always loading the conversations...anyway, it\'s worth the long search for an excellent messaging app.
reviews.author: Arvin Narvaza

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: It could use a UI update. Make a Holo theme that is kind of like the Jelly Bean messenger.
reviews.author: Jamison Rivers

reviews.title: Great but one BIG problem
reviews.comment: Every time someone sends me a pic or mms it just says \"picture\"  in the notification bar, then I open the convo and there is none. No mms, no 5 stars
reviews.author: Justin Ochoa

reviews.title: Its great app
reviews.comment: But need more feature for 5star like private box with security , sehedule sms ,etc i\'m using go sms pro for sehedule sms and private sms ...if yo add these type of features i\'m sure I move on Urs creation ...other then that I would recomended ur contact +  I hop u add this features on next update .,  I\'m waiting for new updation...thank yo
reviews.author: Md hassan

reviews.title: EMOJI
reviews.comment: This app is amazing... Except the long convo waiting time and you should definitely think about adding Emoji. Then I will rate it 5 stars
reviews.author: James Bleakley

reviews.title: Room for improvement
reviews.comment: I love the fact that the messaging UI looks like Facebook\'s but the loading of messages and the involuntary restart of the app is getting on my nerves. I ended up using my stock message just to read my texts.  I have contacts +,  call /dialer + also... And they lag which is ridiculous.  I\'m thinking of uninstalling until the app is improved. The lag is an issue for me.
reviews.author: Sufiea Berries

reviews.title: One critical flaw for me
reviews.comment: Great app in general, but ended up uninstalling because loading the conversation list is just SO slow - it forcibly refreshes the whole thing every time.  The ubiquitous exhortations to use the free messaging were also a bit annoying.
reviews.author: Matthew Avant

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'m loving this app, however it definitely needs a speed fix. Using on note 2 which is not slow by any means, but every time the app loads up it needs to refresh the message list. Also, needs a maximum message limit like the stock messaging app. Would also like to see the option to change the colours of the bubbles but that\'s the least of my worries. Fix the speed and it will be 5 stars.
reviews.author: sufyan al-hassan

reviews.title: Template or attachments
reviews.comment: I have to send my contact details , website, direction to my studio on regular basis to different people. in my  last android mobile 3.1 version , I had a very unique option of sending saved template sms...and that too with gesture control....Missing this feature here badly... at least there should be option of saving template sms and adding them to new sms. Also its very hard to attach any contact\'s name/number in a new sms (not all mobile support business card attachments)
reviews.author: Basudev Ghosh

reviews.title: I like a lot but...
reviews.comment: When sending a text in landscape mode the \"send\" button disappears.  You have to rotate the phone back to portrait to send the text.  Please fix this!  Otherwise a very good text alternative to the stock one on my HTC One.
reviews.author: Scott Doyle

reviews.title: Good app buy some problem
reviews.comment: the idea of this app is good, buy some problem needs to be fix. I cannot send out any massage from the message+ . it takes forever. While I\'m using the built in message just send out right away
reviews.author: Ming Wei

reviews.title: Pretty great...
reviews.comment: It looks and feels awesome... I wish there was an option in contacts+ to set messaging as the default display screen when opening the app. And adding emojis would be greatly appreciated...
reviews.author: Emmanuel Apacible

reviews.title: Looks good but no major improvement
reviews.comment: Looks a lot better than go SMS but less functionality. Group SMS should be to a group not an individually added list.
reviews.author: Tony Haydon

reviews.title: Good but slow, Useful but needs more feature
reviews.comment: Good but it\'s very slow for me. also need Spam filter, private box and schedule messages.
reviews.author: Amin Asemi

reviews.title: Simple and very pretty.
reviews.comment: Simple to use and very pretty. Much better than the regular SMS and contact widget from Android
reviews.author: Bruno F. Silva

reviews.title: Not working on my tab 2 7.0
reviews.comment: Only contacts + is working. And the remaining add ons are not working.  When I open the app, just the contacts will open. Please fix. Looks likenir apps are awesome.  Fix the add ons - Messenger+, call log+, dail+.  All the 3 aren\'t working
reviews.author: Sahith Krishna
